text: Canada will compete at the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, China, from 4 to 20 February 2022. == Ice hockey == Canada has qualified 25 male and 23 female competitors to the ice hockey tournaments as part of their two teams. ===Men's tournament=== Canada men's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 1st in the 2019 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ===Women's tournament=== Canada women's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 2nd in the 2020 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ==References== Category:Nations at the 2022 Winter Olympics 2022 Category:2022 in Canadian sports
title: Canada at the 2022 Winter Olympics
